title: rads error
body: i just bought a new computer and i tried to launch league but it didnt work and all o got was rads error and i have tried everything. like changning my dns but i cant get it to work

replies.body: Sounds like your new rig came with some security measures, which is good.  :D  The rads error usually indicates that something is preventing the patcher or game from launching.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access for league.  Let me know if you have any questions!
